Headline: Temporary Northbound #44 Wallace/Racine Reroute near Racine/86th
ShortDescription: Northbound 44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted near Racine/86th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted via Racine, 87th, Ashland, 83rd, Racine, and resume normal route: due to, street blockage near Racine/86th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
